divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately around 8 pm I saw a bright light in the sky and at first I thought maybe was a plane, than I noticed it stopped moving for a view seconds and than start moving zigzag amazingly fast than went straight and disappeared in the sky. I never believed in UFO's, but after that night's experience my believes totally changed. Who knows what is next...
Summary: Bright light in sky moved zig zag and than disapeared.
